# The `BuildID.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file defines a library for handling Build IDs and using them to find debug info. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file defines a library for handling Build IDs and using them to find debug info.
